A Grade
Meyerbeer [arr. Round]
Oamaru, Otago, New Zealand March contest - 1st Oamaru, 2nd Timaru, 3rd Wellington, 4th Waimate, 5th Kaikorai, 6th North East Valley. 6 bands competed
Aug. 13, 2012, 1:47 p.m. July 13, 2019, 10:02 a.m.

2 Ansett Kaikorai Brass E. Stratton
